entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 06:07 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
